lender.name: Jean-Pierre
lender.loan_because: J'aime aider des gens qui travaillent et se prennent en main

lender.name: Dirk
lender.loan_because: I believe we have a responsibility as an informed and empowered people to take care of those less fortunate then ourselves. Breaking cycles of poverty is not only with in our means, but also our duty.
lender.occupational_info: I am a professional athlete

lender.name: Jacqueline
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do
lender.occupational_info: I am a freelancer in medical and legal research. I also work as a glass artist.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: Atheists of the world unite! Plus, helping others to help themselves. And, microfinance just seems like a great idea.

lender.name: Keith
lender.loan_because:
"I was naked and you gave me clothing, I was sick and you took care of me, I was in prison and you visited me."
Serving our Lord by serving others.
lender.occupational_info: Work as a merchandiser/account manager for a large wholesale grocery distributor.

lender.name: Eric Foster
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping others!
lender.occupational_info: I invest in houses and real estate for profit. I also loan money to others to invest in houses, or to a buy a house for their family to live in.

lender.name: Ghostlobster
lender.loan_because: I have been successful with my business and my life and feel very fortunate. I hope to help make it possible for other's who desire to start businesses to be successful, as well.
lender.occupational_info: I own a business that repairs computers and sets up networks for small to medium businesses and for users of home computers, as well.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.occupation: PhD student and Executive Director, Tariro
lender.loan_because: I am especially interested in loaning to women, as the education and economic empowerment of women is the key to lasting development, stability, and peace.
lender.occupational_info: I am the co-founder and executive director of a grassroots organization working toward HIV prevention through educating young women and girls in Zimbabwe.

lender.name: Gregory
lender.loan_because: I am able

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I love the women of Mali! I want to help women everywhere get into the marketplace and earn money for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I am a mom and volunteer. Have traveled to Mali twice to help villagers build schools.

lender.name: Tamara
lender.loan_because: I feel very blessed! I'm starting my own business and I want to help others.
lender.occupational_info: I'm building a website about homeschooling and working from home.

lender.name: Steven
lender.occupational_info: I am a Real Estate Investor trying to make a difference in the current housing crisis. I look for single family or multi-unit housing that can be refurbished into a place anyone will want to call home. Professional, retiree, or former homeowner can be confident that they will have quality housing with a Williams Management Group property.

lender.name: Robin
lender.loan_because: I want my daughter to grow up aware of the world and compassionate for others.

lender.name: Shannon
lender.loan_because: It is so wonderful to see people doing so much with a little bit of help.

lender.name: Esther
lender.loan_because: I want to encourage beauty through textiles and embroidery.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: hope is for everyone :)
lender.occupational_info: I manage computers that support government services. I would like to be a writer and travel around the world. I'm working on it.

lender.name: Colin
lender.loan_because: I strongly believe in the microfinance system and how it can empower people in developing nations to drastically improve their lives.

lender.name: Adam LeMieux
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Bekah
lender.loan_because: it's the cool thing to do. Everyone's doing it. Give it a try!
lender.occupational_info: I teach 11-12 year olds Language Arts (writing, grammar, mechanics, and reading)

lender.name: Hunter
lender.loan_because: Supporting businesses is a sure fire way to help improve economic conditions around the globe.
lender.occupational_info: I'm currently working to get my Master in Public Administration.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.occupation: Teacher, Youth Staff on cruise ships
lender.loan_because: It feels good.
lender.occupational_info: I keep kids entertained on giant ships, while getting to see the world.

lender.name: Hannah
lender.loan_because: I want to help people reach their full potential.
lender.occupational_info: I just want to let people know that someone cares.

lender.name: Jordan
lender.loan_because: By helping other people, I am making the world a better place.

lender.name: Dale
lender.loan_because: I have the opportunity to help someone trying to earn a sustainable living
lender.occupational_info: I manage supplier relationships for a large computer printer company

lender.name: Kara
lender.occupational_info: I work with individuals with disabilities to help educate about technologies available that can help them be more independent in their lives and more successful in their education.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: it helps me to feel less helpless.
lender.occupational_info: I stay at home and take care of my daughter.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: Who will help the widows and orphans and others in need? If not me, then who?
lender.occupational_info: I was in the military for a time, but when I got out, I wanted to help others. So I have worked in local government, non-profit organizations, and work as a volunteer preparing meals for the homeless. Yes, even in America we have hungry people without homes.

lender.name: Jillian
lender.loan_because: a little can go a long way.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student going into nursing. I love being part of a team that helps people. I hope that what I do makes an impact in someone else's life. I assist nurses and doctors take care of very sick patients. I help draw blood, do small procedures and stock supplies for the nurses and doctors to use.

lender.name: Malina
lender.loan_because: poverty sucks

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I'm excited to see my loans going to help budding entrepreneurs and improving the living conditions of individuals less fortunate than myself.
lender.occupational_info: I solve problems and prevent problems from occurring.

lender.name: Chi Upsilon Sigma
lender.loan_because: we want to help women entrepreneurs better themselves and their communities.
lender.occupational_info: Community Service

lender.name: Janice
lender.loan_because: I know people need a helping hand I am glad to do what I can.

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: I want to do my small part to help make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I provide access to books and other library materials.

lender.name: chrisdyansyah
lender.loan_because: I need additional funds to purchase instructional media, I can not imagine if a teacher has a computer but not the media to teach the computer. monthly salary only for household needs
lender.occupational_info: I am a computer teacher in high school

lender.name: Nadia and Andrejs
lender.occupation: artist and gardener, adventurer and sales
lender.loan_because: My partner Andrejs and I received a Kiva loan gift certificate for Christmas from his sister. Now that we know about this wonderful organization we will continue to give loans and help people get started all over the world.
lender.occupational_info: I was working in an organic vegetable garden, where I maintained the garden, created art for the garden, and assisedt children and families in learning how to grow, harvest and cook their own food. I want to continue on this path, but right now have no job :( Andrejs is working for the outdoor camping store, REI.

lender.name: Nick
lender.loan_because: I want to make the world a happier and better place.

lender.name: Bradley
lender.loan_because: I care about others in the world and their well being.
lender.occupational_info: I help students learn by teaching them in a one-on-one environment. I teach math, social studies, history, English, and science.

lender.name: Joel
lender.loan_because: My friend who developed a virtual keyboard for Burmese called unikode told me about this site. I think of myself as an entrepreneur as well, because I am an independent teacher / tutor.
lender.occupational_info: I teach English as a second language to young children whose parents want them to have a positive feeling about learning the language and an early start communicating and having fun using English.

lender.name: Janys
lender.occupation: Web design, photography and collaborative writing
lender.loan_because: I have a little extra to share
lender.occupational_info: My work is a nice mixture of things I like to do which help other people to promote their business interests and allow me to live a bit more comfortably with my own family.

lender.name: Chetan
lender.loan_because: I like helping people succeed in their endeavors. hope each one of the entrepreneurs success!
lender.occupational_info:
I work very hard at my job and I try to spend as much time as I can with family and friends. My role at work is to bring people together to get things done- I enjoy seeing our collective work succeed.
I like music very much and play drums and the guitar.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: As a teacher, I need to practice what I preach. I want my students to make the world a better place? It starts with me.
lender.occupational_info: I am an international teacher with a passion for creating in my students the vision, the intention and the means to make the world a better place.

lender.name: Magnus
lender.loan_because: I want to give hard-working people a chance to enrich both themselves and the community in which they live.
lender.occupational_info: I help people express their creativity to help them make the world a better place.

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: I want to support the work of entrepreneurs in countries where this may prove to be difficult - or impossible.
lender.occupational_info: I work to share the love of God with as many people as I can.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I want to help people to help themselves. I feel disappointed that charity does not work over the longer term and this loan system feels that it will allow people to become self supporting and maintain their dignity.
lender.occupational_info: A financial adviser helps people to plan their future by making the best use of their money and assets. Setting priorities and goals with clients. Explaining how to use financial products to meet these goals.

lender.name: Gerald
lender.loan_because: I want my business to be more productive
lender.occupational_info: Just going to customer to consult them about home improvement

lender.name: lesley
lender.loan_because: I want to see women like you succeed
lender.occupational_info: I am a hairdresser too and I do so want you to do well as I know it must be harder for you than it was for me.

lender.name: Mason Fok
lender.loan_because: I believe that Entrepreneurs are a driving force in this world and so who better to improve global standards then "Johnny on the spot".
lender.occupational_info: I am an extreme startup enthusiast.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I believe this is the best way to fight poverty

lender.name: elisabeth
lender.loan_because: As an entrepreneur I understand how important having access to capital is to being able to start and grow your business.
lender.occupational_info: I help turn ideas into businesses.

lender.name: Isabelle
lender.loan_because: small actions truly add up. This is what social responsibility is all about.

lender.name: Bora
lender.loan_because: I believe in collaboration between individuals, cultures, nations and so on. I have faith in people, including me and believe in their/our potentials. And this is what I am able to contribute to this cooperation for now. From macro perspectives our world and its people are suffering and seemingly it would last for an unprecedented time. However, considering individuals life from micro perspectives urges me to participate in a way that could make or inspire changes though minor, but necessary and relevant. These sorts of projects keep me hopeful regarding the future of humanity, and particularly being a member of this community makes me an happier person.
lender.occupational_info: Academic / Lecturer in a university

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I am able to.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: Its a practical way to get money circulating. Its also inspiring for me to lend , as I have been loaned money at different points in my life.
lender.occupational_info: Designing everything from album artwork to large scale events at museums, weddings and corporate parties.

lender.name: Jarna of blissfulminds
lender.loan_because: Paying Forward! It just works! Helping others is the way to elevate yourself and others! KIVA ROCKS!
lender.occupational_info: I am a yoga teacher for children and entrepreneur! My job is to inspire the little ones to do great things with their lives. lender.loan_because: I don't like giving handouts.
lender.occupational_info: I assist children with special needs to get the most out of thier lives.

lender.loan_because: I am able to.

lender.name: Bre and Ian

lender.occupational_info: By day, Ian analyzes international tax transaction for a law firm in Washington, DC, and by night, attends law school. Bre is a nurse and a volunteer. Our real job is being new parents.

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: It began with a gift certificate!!! Now I'm hooked---the stories are very inspiring about people working hard to help themselves get ahead
lender.occupational_info: I have raised three children and now live a retired life with my retired husband. I keep house and do much work with my church.

lender.name: Doug

lender.occupational_info: I'm a government employee working in telecommunications and IT support.

lender.name: nodeposit
lender.occupational_info: Ya' baby! this is your place to win!

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: This program is the best idea I have ever heard--quite literally! It bypasses the World Bank and corrupt governments and loans directly to an individual with a specific business need.

lender.name: Bryce
lender.loan_because: It's all I can do until I graduate.
lender.occupational_info: Majoring in developmental economics and international affairs.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: This is an amazing way to help others globally. It's so easy and it makes such a big difference!

lender.name: Robyn
lender.loan_because: I want to help people's dreams come true.

lender.name: Micki
lender.loan_because: I want to help the world become a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I graduated high school and am now on a year off.

lender.name: Allie
lender.loan_because: I am very interesting in helping others. I know that I am very blessed, so I feel that it is my responsibility to help those who aren't as lucky as me. I want to make the world a better place!
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a senior in high school, and I am homeschooled.

lender.name: S. Jeuland
lender.loan_because: providing people the resources they need to work themselves out of poverty empowers them and shows them that the world cares.

lender.name: Breana
lender.loan_because: i just want to make a difference

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I'm in a position to be able to help those that don't have access to the resources I take for granted.
lender.occupational_info: Living in "corporate America" .. what more do I need to say ;-)

lender.name: Jamie
lender.loan_because: I'm a small business owner myself and know how important funding is to helping a business grow.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I'll waste the money if I don't.

lender.name: Ted
lender.loan_because: If it takes a village to raise a child, it takes everyone to raise a society.
lender.occupational_info: I help doctors and hospitals get paid for their services.

lender.name: Donna
lender.loan_because: I heard of Kiva through a friend and am delighted to be a member.
lender.occupational_info: I have been a public servant for 31 years now since I migrated to Canada from South America. Having been born there I truly can relate to the obstacles and hardships endured by these enterprising individuals.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: I care about the lives and dreams of others.
lender.occupational_info: A chance to interact with people.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: a small amount of money for me can improve someone else's life in a sustainable way
lender.occupational_info: linguist interested in endangered languages

lender.name: Gerardo
lender.loan_because: Every hard working individual deserves an opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: My job? Awesome - I work with numbers all day.

lender.name: Sumit
lender.loan_because: I have been fortunate to have great opportunity in my life, and wish for others to have the same

lender.name: The B Family
lender.loan_because: We believe in encouraging people to follow their passions and giving them an opportunity to work to support their families and communities. Our business experience has taught us that it often takes money to make money. People have believed in us enough to invest in our ventures and it is a blessing for us to be able to invest in the lives of others.

lender.name: Phillip
lender.occupational_info: I help healthcare companies raise money.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I've heard about micro-financing from a few different presentations this year (my freshman year of college) and it sounds like the most direct way i can help someone abroad while I'm stuck here studying.
lender.occupational_info: The work of an engineer is to find creative solutions to problems that benefit the world.

lender.name: Juanjo
lender.loan_because: I want to help people to help themselves

lender.name: Tullett Prebon
lender.loan_because: I Love People
lender.occupational_info: Charitable capitalists

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I am grateful that I can.
lender.occupational_info: I purchase women's shoes for a department store based in New York City.

lender.name: julie sands
lender.loan_because: We need to take care of all our people around the world

lender.name: Holly
lender.loan_because: it is better than donating to a charity and it works better than the World Bank and the IMF.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently studying for my Masters degree in International Relations in Bremen, Germany. Global poverty is an issue we deal with a lot, and so far I am very convinced by the promises of microfinance.

lender.name: Lee
lender.loan_because: I hope to leave this world better than I found it.

lender.name: Jennifer Jiong Gong
lender.loan_because: empowerment is beautiful

lender.name: Justinian & Christina
lender.loan_because: it's easy, we can share our successes and help someone reach their goals!

lender.name: Magnus
lender.loan_because: Hopefuly I can make a difference.

lender.name: Marshall
lender.loan_because: I know what it feels like to need money and not have it. Now that I'm in a situation where I can help others I feel it's my duty to do so.
lender.occupational_info: I manage financial investment applications for a larger financial services company.

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: our small, individual actions add up to something amazing.

lender.name: Tamara & Austin
lender.loan_because: I am inspired by those who continue to choose hope and light no matter what their circumstances. I loan to show my son how we make a difference in the lives of others and to keep us connected to the compassion of the world.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: Third world needs investment in order to grow. What better investors than people on the ground who know the pitfalls and the opportunities.
lender.occupational_info: Teach economics, strategy, marketing, and finance to community college students age 18 to 65.

lender.name: will
lender.loan_because: i want to give something back

lender.name: Alyssa
lender.loan_because: I think Kiva gives us a great opportunity to help those that are struggling get up on their feet and moving in the right direction.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student at the moment, studying Creative Writing at the University of Arizona. I'm not sure what I want to do after I graduate. Money is tight, but I have some to spare and love that I can help people with it.

lender.name: Jesse
lender.loan_because: A little help can go a long way.

lender.name: Felipe
lender.loan_because: sharing means caring
lender.occupational_info: I work in a tiny office writing things nobody even reads

lender.name: Pavani
lender.loan_because: I want to help people empower themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I make technology such as computer software or websites easier and more fun to use.

lender.name: Lynne
lender.loan_because: I love to help others and this is so easy to do!
lender.occupational_info: I flunked retirement and went back to work so that I can help others and satisfy myself.

lender.name: Christy
lender.loan_because: There isn't a better feeling in the world than giving and knowing that the need is genuine. Just because we live on opposite sides of the world does not mean that we love, hurt, or need differently.
lender.occupational_info: I write for a local newspaper. I talk to the people who live in the community each day and get to share the stories of their lives.

lender.name: T and C
lender.loan_because: Our Uncle gave us a gift certificate for 2008 Christmas
lender.occupational_info: We are both students and go to school during the week. We both love sport and we play football and netball. We want to do our very best at school to open up opportunities when we are older. We also like to help people in need.

lender.loan_because: Tiffany and Tom asked me to...and to restore Karma
lender.occupational_info: I train college students to tutor elementary students and I make pictures of fruit out of construction paper

lender.name: Rich
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.loan_because: I got a gift certificate for my godchild.

lender.name: Radio
lender.loan_because: I am able and it works.

lender.name: Alan
lender.loan_because: I want to help the least (matt 25:40)

lender.name: Hunter
lender.loan_because: I think that it will help.
lender.occupational_info: Designing systems to treat water and wastewater.

lender.name: Andy
lender.loan_because: I am privileged and luckier than I deserve. If I can give a little back it may help me appreciate what I have and the struggles others endure.
lender.occupational_info: I try hard in school though I bet I could do better with more consistent effort.

lender.name: Pete
lender.loan_because: it will make a difference!

lender.name: Janie

lender.name: Kathleen

lender.name: Catherine

lender.name: Jeff

lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.loan_because: I want to share wealth and prosperity.

lender.occupational_info: I study and prepare myself to work.

lender.loan_because: I like that I can see exactly where my money is going.

lender.name: Kristin

lender.loan_because: it cost very little to play a big part in helping someone achieve their goals.

lender.name: Keri
lender.loan_because: It's about obedience and God tells us to care for the needy, and this is one way I can make a difference in someones life

lender.name: Chenming
lender.loan_because: I love.

lender.name: Ruth
lender.loan_because:
Because we are a matrix with some very BIG differences
* It costs you nothing to join - BBC is completely free! * There are no monthly fees - ever. * There are no upgrade fees * We don‚Äôt sell anything * ..and - you will never be asked to buy anything
Upline & Downline We just ask you to agree to a simple request ‚Ä¶ When asked to do so, you agree to donate an amount of $2.00 to $5.00 to another member on his or her Birthday.
The members to whom you will donate will be
* Your upline - a maximum of nine people * The first level of your personal network - a maximum of three people
lender.occupational_info:
Hi - I‚Äôm Ruthsella and my Birthday is on 26th June
Just imagine - you wake up and it‚Äôs Your Birthday!
You get up, switch on your PC and check your mail - and there are thousands of emails from friends who have sent you cash!
It‚Äôs not a dream - it really can happen!

lender.name: Rashied
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in the world. I want it to mean something that I lived in the world once.
lender.occupational_info: I am part of the management of a hospital's organizational operations. My area of responsibility is regulated/hazardous medical waste, infection control, and environmental care.

lender.name: Joellen
lender.loan_because: I am interested in helping ordinary people of the world to at least achieve a good living for themselves through their own hard work.
lender.occupational_info: I am just an ordinary housewife, mother and grandmother who wants to help the unforunate but very talented people out there thats all.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I like to help people to build up their own business to feed their family. This is the only true way to support someone.
lender.occupational_info: I am a self employed tutor for German language in the County of Devon, United Kingdom.

lender.name: roger n helen
lender.loan_because: We can. Have been in the position to personally see the conditions people work and live in as they struggle to feed their families

lender.name: Ibn Umm Yusuf
lender.loan_because: It Purifies My Soul
lender.occupational_info: We provide In- Home Care for those needing assistance with activities of daily living. This allows seniors to remain in the comfort and safety of their home, instead of a being placed in a nursing home. We also offer Nanny and Nurse services.

lender.name: Edwin
lender.loan_because: It is a very sympathetic way of helping people help their selves. The money can be loaned again and again, which offers the possibility to give a lot more support with the same amount of money as in other situations.
lender.occupational_info: I support organizations with the establishing and improving of test processes for software.

lender.name: Kezia
lender.loan_because: It is better to give than receive.
lender.occupational_info: I work in Advertising / Marketing.

lender.name: Sagacious
lender.loan_because: I love to help society in this horrendous downward economy spiral...If you believe your idea, software, or any internet based model is viable. I will look at it! I prefer to on loan on deals what I know and do best...Internet Based!
lender.occupational_info: Exciting...Always changing with new Internet / software technology advancements daily! Internet as they say moves at the speed of light! Go with your gut feeling first then logic!

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: I want to have progress with my business
lender.occupational_info: Creating customized gift cards

lender.name: Sandira
lender.loan_because: giving is the same as recieving. it makes the world a nicer place to live in.

lender.name: Jan en Hanny
lender.loan_because: We would like to make a big change and start small.

lender.name: Diana
lender.loan_because: I thank God for all I have and want to share.
lender.occupational_info: The company I work for sells metals in many shapes and sizes to individuals and smallI businesses. I test new computer software for my company, I make sure my company has the methods in place to work efficiently give customers the best product

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: I believe the quickest way to escape poverty is entrepreneurship. And as I want people to be happy: here I am!
lender.occupational_info: I build websites, sell domains and deliver webhosting solutions.

lender.name: Donald
lender.loan_because: having lived in a third world country for nearly a year I know first hand the needs of developing countries and wish to be able to help.
lender.occupational_info: I work for Inova Health Systems in Alexandria Virginia as an Xray Technician. I am currently in Med School.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I can. It's the right thing to do. I support entrepreneurs no matter what part of the world they reign from :)
lender.occupational_info: I work at Apple (R022), love photography, fabulous design, movies, grilled salmon with mango salsa - I'm a brunette-haired, brown-eyed lover of life and all things uplifting!

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: "Give a man a fish; you have fed him for a day. Teach a man to fish; and you have fed him for a lifetime. Teach a man to sell fish and he eats steak."
lender.occupational_info: I am a student studying business at The Ohio State Unversity planning on graduating in either 2011 or 2012.

lender.name: Jenna
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Maunark
lender.loan_because: there should be no doubts or second thoughts when it comes to helping others.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: I am thankful for the tremendous opportunities I have had, and I admire people with an entrepreneurial spirit.
lender.occupational_info: I sell software that helps people run their businesses.

lender.name: VIRIDIAN
lender.loan_because: I no longer loan because of secrecy lack of transparency with surrounding financial transactions.. It makes me nervous..
lender.occupational_info: I have shop that sells handmade things from around the world.

lender.name: Dorrie
lender.occupation: Executive Director of a non-profit organization

lender.name: Chad
lender.loan_because: I was lucky enough to be born in a country that allows me to have more than I need.

lender.name: Candrina Bailey - Pebble Road Marketing
lender.loan_because: I support small business locally and internationally.
lender.occupational_info: I help small businesses to sell their products and services to prospective clients.

lender.name: Placid&Julia
lender.loan_because: We can do it and its an excellent way to make things better.

lender.name: Karin
lender.loan_because: When I became a single Mom I had people there who believed in me and wanted to see me succeed. I want this for Nancy
lender.occupational_info: I am also in the car business. I sell them and finance them to customers. Often they are used cars.

lender.name: Corey
lender.occupational_info: I ensure that the bank I work for does not transact business for drug dealers or terrorists. My position is part of the Enterprise Risk Management Team (ERM) and assists in protecting the bank from all risks.

lender.name: Cesar
lender.loan_because: Money is worth what you use it for.

lender.name: Luke
lender.loan_because: Investment of time and or money in others is a truely pure endeavor.

lender.name: Carolyn
lender.loan_because: I want to help women of the world to be able to care for their children so that they can pass that on to their own someday.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of my home and family. I have two grandchildren who I love so much and I do a lot to help take care of them.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: I enjoy seeing people help themselves by establishing small businesses.
lender.occupational_info: My job is to help students with individual counseling or group counseling. I also provide testing services and I am in charge of maintaining a safe environment for students.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who have ideas but need a hand to get started.
lender.occupational_info: Real Estate Loans

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: I am very happy to contribute to help with my means. Also KIVA is a wonderful idea and thank to Guillaume to make me know kiva.

lender.name: Yreina
lender.loan_because: I'm paying it forward.
lender.occupational_info: I am a full-time artist. I also teach art and photography to teenagers in my community 3 days a week.

lender.name: Marijke
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone achieve independence and growth. Good luck to you all!
lender.occupational_info: I add the sales and costs of my company and inform management of our financial results and help plan for the future.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.occupation: leadership class from Burnaby Mountain Secondary

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Beth, Dylah,Blake & Noah
lender.loan_because: I know how it feels to need a helping hand! There is no greater gift to me than knowing I can be there to help.
lender.occupational_info: I am the person who does all the computer work for a small business.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: "It's not about building a wall but making a brick."
lender.occupational_info: I work on restoring native fish species to their habitats, as well as other fisheries and fishing projects.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: simply because I truly believe in the mission of this organization and in the people these loans help.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a health care non-profit organization that provides health insurance premium assistance to patients living with expensive chronic illnesses.

lender.name: Marly
lender.loan_because: Para la compra de diez bultos de soja para elaboraci√≥n de galletas y leche para mujeres, ni√±os y ni√±as en mi comunidad.
lender.occupational_info: venta de producto alimenticio como la soja para la nutrici√≥n de mujeres, ni√±as y ni√±os de escasos recursos.

lender.name: Emma
lender.loan_because: my Grandma gave me the opportunity to do so.

lender.name: Bob/Lisa
lender.loan_because: In honor of the Blankenship Stoll Wedding

lender.name: Miranda
lender.loan_because: we have travelled and lived around the world and want to do something positive to help people in other countries.
lender.occupational_info: We're a family from Scotland living in the US.

lender.name: Trent
lender.loan_because: I understand what its like to have dreams and not be able to fulfill them due to lack of financial capability.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently on a limited income. It's tough to make ends meet sometimes, but even I can help make a difference.

lender.name: Tyler
lender.loan_because:
I think this is a fantastic way to help people help themselves, giving them a sense of pride and control over their destiny rather than having to rely on handouts.
I would much rather invest in ventures I know will make a significant impact in a person's life and have a high liklihood of repayment, rather than throw my money away in pseudo-anonymous stock gambles.
lender.occupational_info: I create computer software to help others work more efficiently.

lender.name: Kevranna
lender.loan_because: This way I can help a person not a charity

lender.name: Azmat
lender.loan_because: Empowering women economically in third world countries is critical to development
lender.occupational_info: I oversee the development of chips used in computers

lender.name: Melanie
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in other people's lives by giving them a helping hand and a step towards a bright and fulfilling future.
lender.occupational_info: I appear on television and movies. My voice can be heard on the radio, television commercials and cartoons.

lender.name: Johan
lender.loan_because:
Kiva is great because it gives people fishingrods instead of fish.
It will make poor people more free and independent of politicians

lender.name: BeltwaySpinner
lender.loan_because: My family is originally from Bolivia, and I have visited many time. I want to help Bolivian women struggling to build their small businesses. Knitting, and the female dominated fiber industry interests me particularly. As a knitter myself, I have respect and admiration for the talent, hardwork, and skill that goes into handknit goods.
lender.occupational_info: Interpreto las leyes de los impuestos para mis clientes.

lender.name: jp taylor
lender.loan_because: It is the responsibility of those who can, to help where they can.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher, environmentalist, and singer/singwriter.

lender.name: Lanel
lender.loan_because: I want to support other people in their venture to become self-employed.
lender.occupational_info: I am a virtual freelance bookkeeper helping businesses stay on top of where they stand financially. I also support small business owners in their venture of starting their own business.

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because: I can, and because I love the stories I've read on this site.
lender.occupational_info: My main job is at a major academic medical center. I educate and train employees on "soft skills" - things like teamwork, communication and leadership that eventually result in better medical care. I also teach swing dancing on the side, which is a form of jazz dancing that originated in the US in the 20s and 30s (but has roots in African dance). I also help teach digital photography/video editing for a nonprofit organization.

lender.name: Chad
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping heal the world through providing opportunity for all people to use their talents and efforts to improve their world.
lender.occupational_info: Training people to change their world

lender.name: Holly
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone that's trying to help him/herself.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping people achieve their goals.
lender.occupational_info: I am a cardiac nurse.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: Loaning works.
lender.occupational_info: I play drums!

lender.name: terry
lender.loan_because: 1% of my income has no utility to me, but I hope it will help others make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: People pay me to make services on the internet serve all the people they serve.

lender.name: Mary Ann
lender.loan_because: a simple act of kindness can ripple across the world. my hope is that my contributions will help someone across this world fulfill their dreams and live a better life.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I am grateful and hopeful

lender.name: JKB
lender.loan_because: I enjoy the spirit of all the individuals around the world working together to improve their quality of life.

lender.name: Jimmy
lender.loan_because: I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I am almost one so I basically play all day.

lender.name: Theodore
lender.loan_because: It fills me with a smug sense of superiority.

lender.name: Olga
lender.loan_because: I am thrilled by my own ability to gift and enable through such a small but significant commitment. It is rewarding to hear the stories and know that you have a part in helping people gain their ground.
lender.occupational_info: A student in biochemistry at the University of Ottawa. A traveler, an artist, a thinker.

lender.name: Ben
lender.loan_because: $25 would earn a meaningless amount of interest in a bank, or it could help change someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I work on control and management of invasive and nuisance aquatic weeds.

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: This is a wonderful way to help others and watch as they succeed.

lender.name: Carrie
lender.loan_because: I want to help women around the world get out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying for my PhD in chemistry, so I can teach chemistry at the college level.

lender.name: Caroline
lender.loan_because: I believe that when you give to others it comes back to you threefold. I am blessed with good things in my life and I want others to have the same.
lender.occupational_info: I assist small business owners with their administrative and marketing tasks.

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: I believe that the best way to make a difference in people's lives is to help them in a way that allows them to be self-sustaining and maintain their dignity.
lender.occupational_info: I work with a team that buys materials that is used to make high speed satellite communication equipment.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I believe in empowerment and supporting opportunity for others to have a better quality of life.

lender.name: Wadley Family
lender.loan_because: We want to help less fortunate people to have a better shot at life. And to teach our daughters the gift of giving to others.

lender.name: Hari Vutukuru
lender.occupation: Student, U of Michigan, Ann Arbor, MI.
lender.loan_because: I believe I can make a difference. I think that poverty is the root cause of all evil in this world. We can make this world a better place through micro-financing.

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: give a fish = one meal; teach to fish = meals for life

lender.name: Rachael
lender.loan_because:
I feel connected and helpful when I loan to people who are integral to the success of their communities.

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: God has made it clear that we need to take care of the poor people.

lender.name: Terry

lender.occupational_info: I am a hard worker that wants to help other hard workers. We're in this together

lender.name: Kelsey
lender.loan_because: entrepreneurs are the dreamers of our world.
lender.occupational_info: First and foremost I am a student. But when working I lend a hand to my family's business. It is from this experience that I have developed great respect for entrepreneurs.
